info.title: Hi, my name is Alicio Romoli
info.text: As a Front End developer I have experience working in web applications and building websites using JavaScript, Typescript, React, Redux. I also have experience working on Back End using NodeJS, and database like mongoDB, Postgres, fireBase and typeORM

info.title: Roehampton Uiversity
info.text: Specialization: Web Engineering & Security,Introduction to Devices & Networks, User Experience Design, Object-Oriented Programming, Data Science for Developers, Cloud Computing.

info.title: Rockeseat
info.text: Specialization: Nodejs, Javascript, Css, Express, Nunjucks, Postgres

info.title: Front End
info.subhead: As a Front End developer I have experience working in web applications and building websites using JavaScript, Typescript, React, Redux. I also have experience working on Back End using NodeJS, and database like mongoDB, Postgres, fireBase and typeORM

info.title: Crpto Finance
info.text:
• A website that was built using Backend-as-a-Service platform(firebase) and front end(ReactJS).
  • The app uses CRUD(Create, Read, Update and Delete) in order to manipulate the data from the register users.

info.title: Foodfy
info.subhead: Stacks: JAVASCRIPT NODEJS EXPRESS POSTGRES CSS NUNJUCKS
info.text:
• The project geared towards culinary in general. A Recipe website made by users .
  • It has an admin system for managing data purposes, which includes information about chefs, users, and recipes.
  • The Frameworks and technologies used for front end and back end was NodeJs, SQL Server (PostGresSQL), express, nunjucks and Javascript.

info.title: Ecoleta
info.subhead: Stacks: NODEJS EXPRESS TYPESCRIPT REACTNATIVE REACT SQLITE KNEX
info.text:
• A website that was built using Backend-as-a-Service platform(firebase) and front end(ReactJS).
  • The app uses CRUD(Create, Read, Update and Delete) in order to manipulate the data from the register users.
